summary: This bill, the Federal Maritime Commission Reauthorization Act of 2025, reauthorizes appropriations for the Federal Maritime Commission (FMC) for fiscal years 2026-2029. It amends various sections of U.S. Code Title 46 related to maritime operations, including those concerning complaints against shipping exchanges, data collection, investigations, and national advisory committees. The bill also addresses containerized freight indexes, makes technical amendments, and mandates the FMC to publish rules related to price indexes for containerized ocean freight.
